SELECT
FROM vehicle_browsing_history INNER JOIN vehicle ON vehicle_browsing_history.vehicleId = vehicle.id AND vehicle.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN vehicle_brand ON vehicle.brandId = vehicle_brand.id AND vehicle_brand.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN vehicle_model ON vehicle.modelId = vehicle_model.id AND vehicle_model.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN vehicle_type_detail ON vehicle.vehicleTypeId = vehicle_type_detail.id AND vehicle_type_detail.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN energy_type_detail ON vehicle.energyTypeId = energy_type_detail.id ANd energy_type_detail.isDelete = 0 WHERE vehicle_browsing_history.userId = #{userId} AND vehicle_browsing_history.isDelete = 0 ORDER BY vehicle_browsing_history.browseTime DESC
